body.footer: IIRC there was an intention to allow ownership reassignment of all objects in the database. Somehow views got missed (probably because they don't currently have an ALTER command). If there isn't a lot of code involved in making this happen, I'd argue it should go in as a bug fix. If not, can we add it to the TODO for 8.3? -- Jim Nasby jim@nasby.net EnterpriseDB http://enterprisedb.com 512.569.9461 (cell)
